module.name: Caller ID Lookup
module.description: Allows Caller ID Lookup of incoming calls against different sources (MySQL, HTTP, ENUM, Phonebook Module)
module.changelog: *1.1* First release for FreePBX 2.2 - Fixed compatibility issue with new UI *1.0.4* Updated module.xml format *1.0.3* Fixes from #999 *1.0.1* Added possibility to cache in astDB Added lookup from cache before querying external source *1.0.0* First release
